Title: formatQuerySingleLine
Description: Like formatQuery() but the returned formatted string contains no line breaks.
Throws an exception if the query is not well-formed. To return NULL instead, function formatQuerySingleLineOrNull() may be used.
query - The SQL query to be formatted. String
Examples: SELECT formatQuerySingleLine('select a,    b FRom tab WHERE a > 3 and  b < 3');
